meta.name: viewport
meta.title: COVID-19 Update On School Closure - Idaho Falls School District #91

link.title: Curriculum - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.label: Translate Page

span.p: Based on new guidance from the White House, D91 has made the difficult decision to close schools through at least the end of Spring Break. We will continue working on our plans to support students and families in the event of a long-term closure after Spring Break.
For the most current information on the impacts of the virus:

strong.a: Idaho Official Resource for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19)

p.br: If you have specific concerns Eastern Idaho Public Health has set up a EIPH COVID-19 Hotline: (208) 522-0310 or (855) 533-3160 toll free. The hotline is open Monday-Friday 8 am to 5 pm.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-5 col-md-5 col-lg-4 textCenterOnMobile bgSecondary bgExtend left
col-xs-12 col-sm-7 col-md-7 col-lg-8 bgPrimary bgExtend right

div.p: Idaho Falls School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to all individuals. Learn More.

h4.span: Verify your school has your cell phone number in PowerSchool and text Yes to 67587.

h5.em: To stop receiving text messages text the word STOP to 67587.
